SELECT t.content_id, t.board_id, t.type, t.page_id, t.title, t.content, t.attachmentid, t.bind_type, t.bind_source, t.count, t.sort_order, t.status, t.start_time, t.end_time, t.ctime, t.mtime, p.title AS page_name, b.name AS board_name, a.title AS attachment_title, a.filepath AS attachment_file_Path FROM advert_content t INNER JOIN advert_board b ON t.board_id = b.board_id INNER JOIN advert_page p ON t.page_id = p.page_id LEFT JOIN trend_attachment a ON t.attachmentid = a.attachmentid WHERE t.content_id = #{contentId}
